44template <class T>
45class ValueArg : public Arg {
46protected:
52 T _value;
53
58 T _default;
59
67 std::string _typeDesc;

72 const Constraint<T> *_constraint;
73
80 void _extractValue(const std::string &val);

82public:

104 const std::string &desc, bool req, T value,
105 const std::string &typeDesc, Visitor *v = NULL);

129 const std::string &desc, bool req, T value,
130 const std::string &typeDesc, ArgContainer &parser,

226template <class T>
227ValueArg<T>::ValueArg(const std::string &flag, const std::string &name,
228 const std::string &desc, bool req, T val,
229 const std::string &typeDesc, Visitor *v)
230 : Arg(flag, name, desc, req, true, v),
231 _value(val),
232 _default(val),
233 _typeDesc(typeDesc),
234 _constraint(NULL) {}
235
236template <class T>
237ValueArg<T>::ValueArg(const std::string &flag, const std::string &name,
238 const std::string &desc, bool req, T val,
239 const std::string &typeDesc, ArgContainer &parser,
240 Visitor *v)
241 : Arg(flag, name, desc, req, true, v),
242 _value(val),
243 _default(val),
244 _typeDesc(typeDesc),
245 _constraint(NULL) {
246 parser.add(this);
247}
248
249template <class T>
250ValueArg<T>::ValueArg(const std::string &flag, const std::string &name,
251 const std::string &desc, bool req, T val,
252 const Constraint<T> *constraint, Visitor *v)
253 : Arg(flag, name, desc, req, true, v),
254 _value(val),
255 _default(val),
256 _typeDesc(Constraint<T>::shortID(constraint)),
257 _constraint(constraint) {}
258
259template <class T>
260ValueArg<T>::ValueArg(const std::string &flag, const std::string &name,
261 const std::string &desc, bool req, T val,
262 const Constraint<T> *constraint, ArgContainer &parser,
263 Visitor *v)
264 : Arg(flag, name, desc, req, true, v),
265 _value(val),
266 _default(val),
267 _typeDesc(Constraint<T>::shortID(constraint)),
268 _constraint(constraint) {
269 parser.add(this);
270}
271
275template <class T>
276bool ValueArg<T>::processArg(int *i, std::vector<std::string> &args) {
277 if (_hasBlanks(args[*i])) return false;
278
279 std::string flag = args[*i];
280
281 std::string value = "";
282 trimFlag(flag, value);
283
284 if (argMatches(flag)) {
285 if (_alreadySet) {
286 throw(CmdLineParseException("Argument already set!", toString()));
287 }
288
289 if (Arg::delimiter() != ' ' && value == "")
290 throw(ArgParseException(
291 "Couldn't find delimiter for this argument!", toString()));
292
293 if (value == "") {
294 (*i)++;
295 if (static_cast<unsigned int>(*i) < args.size())
296 _extractValue(args[*i]);
297 else
298 throw(ArgParseException("Missing a value for this argument!",
299 toString()));
300 } else {
301 _extractValue(value);
302 }
303
304 _alreadySet = true;
305 _setBy = flag;
306 _checkWithVisitor();
307 return true;
308 } else {
309 return false;
310 }
311}
312
316template <class T>
317std::string ValueArg<T>::shortID(const std::string &) const {
318 return Arg::shortID("<" + _typeDesc + ">");
319}
320
324template <class T>
325std::string ValueArg<T>::longID(const std::string &) const {
326 return Arg::longID("<" + _typeDesc + ">");
327}
328
329template <class T>
330void ValueArg<T>::_extractValue(const std::string &val) {
331 try {
332 ExtractValue(_value, val, typename ArgTraits<T>::ValueCategory());
333 } catch (ArgParseException &e) {
334 throw ArgParseException(e.error(), toString());
335 }
336
337 if (_constraint != NULL)
338 if (!_constraint->check(_value))
339 throw(CmdLineParseException("Value '" + val +
340 +"' does not meet constraint: " +
341 _constraint->description(),
342 toString()));
343}
344
345template <class T>
346void ValueArg<T>::reset() {
347 Arg::reset();
348 _value = _default;
349}
350
351} // namespace TCLAP

353#endif // TCLAP_VALUE_ARG_H
